name: bzout
overview:
Bzout (formerly bluvelive) is a social networking service and social search engine.

Bzout is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read text-based messages of up to 200 characters, known as “ZOUT”.

Trending topics

A word, phrase or topic that is tagged at a greater rate than other tags is said to be a trending topic. Trending topics become popular either through a concerted effort by users or because of an event that prompts people to talk about one specific topic. These topics help BZout and their users to understand what is happening in the world

Bzout is not meant to compete with popular social networks such as Facebook, Google+, and Twitter. Bzout isn’t a place to connect with friends and share moments from your lives.

Instead, Bzout is more like an image board where you post and share web-based content based on general interest categories such as cars, movies, and sports – all of which is filtered through a built-in google search tool.

Bzout isn’t for everyone and convincing users to fit this site into an already busy online life with Facebook, Google+, Twitter.
